snippet: The 82-year-old has been recording with her daughter, Patsy L. Russell, and John Carter Cash, for a project combining new songs and old folk and gospel tunes.
abstract: The 82-year-old has been recording with her daughter, Patsy L. Russell, and John Carter Cash, for a project combining new songs and old folk and gospel tunes.

headline.main: New Loretta Lynn Project Includes New and Old Music
headline.print_headline: A New Project From Loretta Lynn
